references.paper_title: Embodied Hands: Modeling and capturing hands and bodies together
references.reason: This paper provides a fundamental model for hand and body representation, which is a crucial element in many 3D reconstruction methods, including the one proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mamba framework, which is the core foundation of the proposed approach in this paper.
